chapters.title: Prologue: By Grace and Banners Fallen
chapters.info: Lord Algarin Pendaloan, p. 58—Lesser Lord of the Land in Tear. He had a wrinkly face and a white beard. He provided accomodations for Rand, Min, Verin, Cadsuane, Lan, Nynaeve, and the rest of their group on his manor so they could recuperate from the events at Shadar Logoth. His younger brother Emarin could channel, and Algarin wanted to be tested for the ability as well; he is now one of the Dedicated in the Black Tower, using his younger brother's name to conceal his identity. Androl figured it out. See also Emarin.
